# Portal (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Fharlanghn]], [[Lolth]], [[Moradin]], Vecna, Wee Jas |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | Eilistraee, Shaundakul |

**Granted Powers:** You can detect an active or inactive portal as if it were a normal secret door ([[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] {v3.5 Search} DC 20). You gain Portal Sensitive as a bonus feat.

**Portal Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Summon Monster I (Spell)|Summon Monster I]]****:** Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.

**   [[Portal Stabilization (Spell)|Portal Stabilization]]:** Stabilize malfunctioning portal for 1 minute/level.

**2** **[[Analyze Portal (Spell)|Analyze Portal]]****:** Find a nearby portal and discover its properties.

**3** **[[Dimensional Anchor (Spell)|Dimensional Anchor]]****:** Bars extradimensional movement.

   **[[Portal View (Spell)|Portal View]]:** Turns target portal transparent.

**4** **[[Dimension Door (Spell)|Dimension Door]]****:** Teleports you a short distance.

**5** **[[Teleport (Spell)|Teleport]]****:** Instantly transports you as far as 100 miles per level.

   **[[Portal Barricade (Spell)|Portal Barricade]]:** Closes portal and prevents it from functioning for 1 hour/level.

**6** **[[Banishment (Spell)|Banishment]]****:** Banishes 2 HD/level of extraplanar creatures.

   **[[Portal-to-Portal Redirect (Spell)|Portal-to-Portal Redirect]]:** Changes destination of portal for 1 hour/level.

**7** **[[Etherealness (Spell)|Etherealness]]****:** Travel to [[Ethereal Plane]] with companions.

**8** **[[Maze (Spell)|Maze]]****:** Traps subject in extradimensional maze.

   **[[Portal Reformat (Spell)|Portal Reformat]] <sup>X</sup>:** Removes or adds one or more keys to portal.

**9** **[[Gate (Spell)|Gate]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** Connects two planes for travel or summoning.


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 278 |
|---|---|
| | Underdark (WotC), pg. 53 |
